name: ripple-lib-value
description: Classes for dealing with Ripple amount values

scripts.typecheck: babel --optional runtime --blacklist flow -d build/flow/ src/ && flow check
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.lint: if ! [ -f eslintrc ]; then curl -o eslintrc 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ripple/javascript-style-guide/es6/eslintrc'; echo 'parser: babel-eslint' >> eslintrc; fi; eslint -c eslintrc src/
